problem_text: New Vessel Press is a publishing house which specializes in translating foreign literature into English. All of New Vessel Press's published books are in English. Neapolitan Chronicles is a book published by New Vessel Press. Neapolitan Chronicles was translated from Italian. Palace of Flies is a book published by New Vessel Press.
predicates:
PublishingHouse(x) ::: x is a publishing house.
Specializes(x, y) ::: x specializes in y.
ForeignLiterature(x) ::: x is foreign literature.
English(x) ::: x is in English.
Book(x) ::: x is a book.
PublishedBy(x, y) ::: x is published by y.
TranslatedFrom(x, y) ::: x was translated from y.
Italian(x) ::: x is Italian.
Name(x, y) ::: x is named y.

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? All books translated from Italian by New Vessel Press are foreign literature.
tests.conclusions: ∀x (Book(x) ∧ PublishedBy(x, NewVesselPress) ∧ TranslatedFrom(x, Italian) → ForeignLiterature(x)) ::: TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Neapolitan Chronicles is foreign literature.
tests.conclusions: ForeignLiterature(neapolitanChronicles) ::: Neapolitan Chronicles is foreign literature. TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? There exists a book that is published by New Vessel Press and is not in English.
tests.conclusions: ∃x (PublishedBy(x, newVesselPress) ∧ ¬English(x)) ::: There exists a book that is published by New Vessel Press and is not in English. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? There exists a book that is published by New Vessel Press and was translated from Italian.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? New Vessel Press specializes in Italian books.
tests.conclusions: Specializes(NewVesselPress, Italian) ::: New Vessel Press specializes in Italian books. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Neapolitan Chronicles is foreign literature, then Palace of Flies is in English.

Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If New Vessel Press specializes in foreign literature and a book is published by New Vessel Press, then that book is translated from Italian.
tests.conclusions: (Specializes(new_vessel_press, foreign_literature) ∧ PublishedBy(x, new_vessel_press)) → TranslatedFrom(x, italian) ::: FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Neapolitan Chronicles is a book published by New Vessel Press and is translated from Italian.
tests.conclusions: PublishedBy(neapolitanChronicles, newVesselPress) ∧ TranslatedFrom(neapolitanChronicles, italian) ∧ Book(neapolitanChronicles) ::: TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? There exists a publishing house that specializes in translating Italian literature into English.
tests.conclusions: ∃x (PublishingHouse(x) ∧ Specializes(x, Italian) ∧ TranslatedFrom(x, Italian) ∧ English(x)) ::: FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? New Vessel Press specializes in foreign literature and publishes books that are in English.

candidate_solutions.text:
# Predicates:
PublishingHouse(x) ::: x is a publishing house.
Specializes(x, y) ::: x specializes in y.
ForeignLiterature(x) ::: x is foreign literature.
English(x) ::: x is in English.
Book(x) ::: x is a book.
PublishedBy(x, y) ::: x is published by y.
TranslatedFrom(x, y) ::: x was translated from y.
Italian(x) ::: x is Italian.
Name(x, y) ::: x is named y.

# Premises:
PublishingHouse(newVesselPress) ∧ Specializes(newVesselPress, ForeignLiterature) ::: New Vessel Press is a publishing house which specializes in translating foreign literature into English.
∀x (PublishedBy(x, newVesselPress) → English(x)) ::: All of New Vessel Press's published books are in English.
Book(neapolitanChronicles) ∧ PublishedBy(neapolitanChronicles, newVesselPress) ∧ TranslatedFrom(neapolitanChronicles, Italian) ::: Neapolitan Chronicles is a book published by New Vessel Press. Neapolitan Chronicles was translated from Italian.
Book(palaceOfFlies) ∧ PublishedBy(palaceOfFlies, newVesselPress) ::: Palace of Flies is a book published by New Vessel Press.

Book(neapolitanChronicles) ∧ PublishedBy(neapolitanChronicles, newVesselPress) ∧ TranslatedFrom(neapolitanChronicles, Italian) ::: Neapolitan Chronicles is a book published by New Vessel Press. Neapolitan Chronicles was translated from Italian.
Book(palaceOfFlies) ∧ PublishedBy(palaceOfFlies, newVesselPress) ::: Palace of Flies is a book published by New Vessel Press.
Italian(neapolitanChronicles) ::: Neapolitan Chronicles is Italian.
